languages.text: "Я — твоя тень, Домин'{name}, и мне должно быть незримой. Но сегодня пусть все видят, что моя кровь принадлежит тебе". {n}Кибелла надрезает ладонь и касается сердца, губ и лба. Подданные разных сословий вслед за ней вспарывают руки и осеняют себя кровавым знамением.{/n}

"I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я — твоя тень, Домин'{name}, и мне должно быть незримой. Но сегодня пусть все видят, что моя кровь принадлежит тебе". {n}Кибелла надрезает ладонь и касается сердца, губ и лба. Подданные разных сословий вслед за ней вспарывают руки и осеняют себя кровавым знамением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am your shadow, Enim'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

"I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis votre ombre, Domin'{name}, et une ombre doit normalement rester hors de vue. Mais que tous, en ce jour, voient que mon sang vous appartient. » {n}Kibellah s'entaille la paume avant de toucher son cœur, ses lèvres et son front. Comme un seul homme, tous vos sujets, quelle que soit leur origine, se tailladent également la main pour reproduire le signe sanglant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis votre ombre, Domin'{name}, et une ombre doit normalement rester hors de vue. Mais que tous, en ce jour, voient que mon sang vous appartient. » {n}Kibellah s'entaille la paume avant de toucher son cœur, ses lèvres et son front. Comme un seul homme, tous vos sujets, quelle que soit leur origine, se tailladent également la main pour reproduire le signe sanglant.{/n}

languages.text: «Soy su sombra, Domin'{name}, y las sombras no deben ser vistas. Pero en este día, que todos vean que mi sangre le pertenece». {n}Kibellah se hace un corte en la palma de la mano y se toca el corazón, los labios y la frente. Al unísono, tus súbditos de toda clase empiezan a cortarse en las manos, repitiendo el sangriento signo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Soy su sombra, Domin'{name}, y las sombras no deben ser vistas. Pero en este día, que todos vean que mi sangre le pertenece». {n}Kibellah se hace un corte en la palma de la mano y se toca el corazón, los labios y la frente. Al unísono, tus súbditos de toda clase empiezan a cortarse en las manos, repitiendo el sangriento signo.{/n}

languages.text: 「我はあなたの影だ、ドミン・{name}。そして影は人に姿を見られてはいけない。だけどこの日は、我が血があなたのものであることをすべての人に見せよう」{n}キベラは手のひらを切り、心臓、唇、額と順に触れた。あらゆる階級の家臣達が一斉に手を切り始めて、同じように血のサインをつける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我はあなたの影だ、ドミン・{name}。そして影は人に姿を見られてはいけない。だけどこの日は、我が血があなたのものであることをすべての人に見せよう」{n}キベラは手のひらを切り、心臓、唇、額と順に触れた。あらゆる階級の家臣達が一斉に手を切り始めて、同じように血のサインをつける。{/n}

languages.text: “我是你的影子，秘者{name}。影子不该被任何人看见，但此时此刻，我要让所有人都看到我的鲜血属于你。”{n}绮贝菈割开了她的手掌，触碰着她的心脏、嘴唇与前额。全体臣民不分阶层，纷纷效仿着她的样子，割开了他们自己的手，重复着这个血腥的印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是你的影子，秘者{name}。影子不该被任何人看见，但此时此刻，我要让所有人都看到我的鲜血属于你。”{n}绮贝菈割开了她的手掌，触碰着她的心脏、嘴唇与前额。全体臣民不分阶层，纷纷效仿着她的样子，割开了他们自己的手，重复着这个血腥的印记。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bin Euer Schatten, Domin'{name}, und ein Schatten muss ungesehen bleiben. Aber an diesem Tag sollen alle sehen, dass mein Blut Euch gehört." {n}Kibellah schneidet sich in ihre Handfläche und berührt damit Herz, Lippen und Stirn. Deine Untertanen aller Klassen schneiden sich geschlossen ebenfalls die Hände auf und wiederholen das blutige Zeichen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Euer Schatten, Domin'{name}, und ein Schatten muss ungesehen bleiben. Deine Untertanen aller Klassen schneiden sich geschlossen ebenfalls die Hände auf und wiederholen das blutige Zeichen.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben senin gölgenim Domin'{name} ve bir gölgenin gizli kalması gerekir. Ancak bugün, bırakalım da herkes kanımın senin için aktığını görsün." {n}Kibellah, avcunu keserek kalbine, dudaklarına ve alnına dokunuyor. Her kesimden gelen tebaanın bireyleri, tek vücut olup ellerini keserek aynı kanlı işareti tekrar ermeye başlıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am your shadow, Domin'{name}, and a shadow must remain unseen. But on this day, let all see that my blood is yours." {n}Kibellah cuts her palm and touches her heart, lips, and forehead. As one, your subjects of all classes start slicing their hands, repeating the bloody sign.{/n}
